data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Peren that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Peren, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 1,047 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Peren.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 1,047 believers in the county of Peren to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Peren, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Assamese (Sikh traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Peren, Nagaland, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,047 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Peren that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Peren
location.people_groups_list: Tai Taroi, Assamese (Muslim traditions), Abor, Arleng, Thakali
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tai Taroi (2,100), Assamese (Muslim traditions) (2,691,000), Abor (1,600), Arleng (497,000), Thakali (1,500)
